text: The 2013 EBSA European Under-21 Snooker Championships was an amateur snooker tournament that took place from 18 March to 22 March 2013 in Bor Serbia It was the 17th edition of the EBSA European Under-21 Snooker Championships and also doubles as a qualification event for the World Snooker Tour. The tournament was won by 14th seed James Cahill who defeated fellow Englishman Ashley Carty 6–0 in the final, becoming the only player to win the final by a whitewash in the tournaments history. As a result, Cahill was given a two-year card on the professional World Snooker Tour for the 2013/2014 and 2014/2015 seasons. ==Results== ===Round 1=== Best of 7 frames {| width="100%" cellspacing="5" |- !width=5%| !width=40%| !width=10%| !width=5%| !width=40%| |- | 33 || Georgi Velichkov || align="center"| 4–3 || 32 || Felix Frede |- | 17 || Lee Mein || align="center"| 4–2 || 48 || Nathanaël Beckrich |- | 41 || David Corens || align="center"| 3–4 || 24 || Lukas Kleckers |- | 25 || Andreas Ploner || align="center"| 4–2 || 40 || Markus Pfistermüller |- | 37 || Marco Mucci || align="center"| 0–4 || 28 || Sascha Breuer |- | 21 || Josh Boileau || align="center"| 4–0 || 44 || Alexis Callewaert |- | 45 || Heikki Niva || align="center"| 4–1 || 20 || Olli-Pekka Virho |- | 29 || Vladyslav Vyshnevskyy || align="center"| 4–1 || 36 || Vladu Mihai |} {| width="100%" cellspacing="5" |- !width=5%| !width=40%| !width=10%| !width=5%| !width=40%| |- | 35 || Vilius Schulte || align="center"| 4–1 || 30 || Ivailo Pekov |- | 19 || Joseph McLaren || align="center"| 4–3 || 46 || Jeff Jacobs |- | 43 || Mario Amza || align="center"| 0–4 || 22 || Brian Cini |- | 27 || Kacper Filipiak || align="center"| 4–2 || 38 || Maor Shalom |- | 39 || Andy McCloskey || align="center"| 1–4 || 26 || Darryl Hill |- | 23 || Jason Devaney || align="center"| 4–1 || 42 || Jakub Koniar |- | 47 || Sam Thomas || align="center"| 4–0 || 18 || Robin Otto |- | 31 || Andrew Doherty || align="center"| 4–0 || 34 || Jesse Huttunen |} ==References== Category:2013 in snooker Category:Snooker amateur tournaments Category:Bor District Category:2013 in Serbian sport Category:International sports competitions hosted by Serbia Category:Sport in Southern and Eastern Serbia
